messages.body_html:
Today I could not place an order on the website since the system would not send (email) me a code. (Tried at least 3 times and waited for 20 minutes each time) I called and was told that I had 2 accounts with the same email so she took my order over the phone and told me that she was combining the 2 accounts (which should not have occurred in the first place.) I was supposed to get an email confirming the order but did not. Also I have tried to log in again to see if the system was working (as your rep told me to) and I did not get sent a code. (Again) My credit card has been charged. Can you please email me an order number and tracking info and also fix it so I can log into my account? I placed the order about 1PM central time and it is now 5:30 and no confirmation. Thanks in advance for your assistance
Maryetta Petras
